NC.Q: Between the flows from node Cash Purchase to node Single Family Home and from node Lease-to-Own to node Townhouse, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Cash Purchase to node Condo, from node Cash Purchase to node Multi-family Unit, and from node Urban to node Cash Purchase, which path has the largest flow?
